features.name: Authentication System
features.description: User login, registration, password reset, and protected routes with role-based access control

features.name: Chat System
features.description: AI-powered chat interface with Pat (AI assistant) for nutrition and health guidance

features.name: Nutrition Pipeline
features.description: Meal logging, macro calculation, and nutrition data processing with multiple providers (brand, gemini, generic)

features.name: TDEE Calculation
features.description: Total Daily Energy Expenditure calculation with personalized user data

features.name: User Dashboard
features.description: Main dashboard showing user progress, meals, and health metrics

features.name: Admin Panel
features.description: Administrative interface for managing users, roles, and system settings

features.name: Swarm AI System
features.description: Multi-agent AI system with personality swarms and intent routing

features.name: Onboarding Flow
features.description: Multi-step user onboarding with TDEE calculation and profile setup

features.name: Trainer Features
features.description: Trainer dashboard for managing clients and their data
